sentences.english: Fever and fussiness without an apparent cause may result from UTI.

sentences.english: AUA can refer you to a urologist in your area.
sentences.chinese: AUA可以向你推荐你所在地区的泌尿科医师。

sentences.english: If your dog is urinating blood, that means he probably has a urinary tract infection.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的狗尿血，这意味着他可能有泌尿道感染。

sentences.english: Relapsing contralateral upper-tract cancer and bladder recurrence were noted during follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 追踪时发现在对侧上泌尿道及膀胱有肿瘤复发迹象。

sentences.english: Once his work-up came back unrevealing, the urologist suggested a cystoscopy .
sentences.chinese: 检查完了，泌尿科医生建议做个膀胱镜。

sentences.english: He is the chief editor of the publication "minimally invasive surgery and urology map".

sentences.english: Objiective To evaluate the use of laparoscopy in diagnosis of diseases of the urogenital system.

sentences.english: Ureaplasma urealyticum is a major pathogen which caused urogenital infections.

sentences.english: BTCC is the most common urinary system carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱癌为泌尿系统最常见的恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Protection against urinary tract infection is less recognised.
sentences.chinese: 其对泌尿道的保护作用较少认识。

sentences.english: Excessive legal proceedings have added to urologists' mental burden.

sentences.english: Those with moderate and severe pyelectasis are likely to have abnormalities of urinary or other systems.
